^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

GenerateCSRAndImport.description: This action generates Certificate Singing Request(CSR), signs and imports the singed certificate.
GenerateCSRAndImport.longDescription: This action will generate a Certificate Singing Request(CSR), sign the certificate using the uploaded Custom Signing Certificate(CSC) and will import the singed certificate.

AlternativeNames.description: The additional host names of the component to secure.
AlternativeNames.longDescription: This parameter shall contain an array of additional host names of the component to secure, as defined by the RFC5280 'subjectAltName' attribute.

CertificateCollection.description: The link to the certificate collection where the certificate is installed after the certificate authority (CA) signs the certificate.
CertificateCollection.longDescription: This parameter shall contain a link to a resource collection of type CertificateCollection where the certificate is installed after the certificate authority (CA) signs the certificate.

City.description: The city or locality of the organization making the request.
City.longDescription: This parameter shall contain the city or locality of the organization making the request, as defined by the RFC5280 'localityName' attribute.

CommonName.description: The fully qualified domain name of the component to secure.
CommonName.longDescription: This parameter shall contain the fully qualified domain name of the component to secure, as defined by the RFC5280 'commonName' attribute.

Country.description: The two-letter country code of the organization making the request.
Country.longDescription: This parameter shall contain the two-letter ISO code for the country of the organization making the request, as defined by the RFC5280 'countryName' attribute.

CustomSigningCertificate.description: The link to the Custom Sigining Certificate(CSC) which is used to sign the certificate.
CustomSigningCertificate.longDescription: This parameter shall contain a link the Custom Sigining Certificate(CSC) which is used to sign the certificate.

Email.description: The email address of the contact within the organization making the request.
Email.longDescription: This parameter shall contain the email address of the contact within the organization making the request, as defined by the RFC2985 'emailAddress' attribute.

Organization.description: The name of the organization making the request.
Organization.longDescription: This parameter shall contain the name of the organization making the request, as defined by the RFC5280 'organizationName' attribute.

OrganizationalUnit.description: The name of the unit or division of the organization making the request.
OrganizationalUnit.longDescription: This parameter shall contain the name of the unit or division of the organization making the request, as defined by the RFC5280 'organizationalUnitName' attribute.

State.description: The state, province, or region of the organization making the request.
State.longDescription: This parameter shall contain the state, province, or region of the organization making the request, as defined by the RFC5280 'stateOrProvinceName' attribute.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

GetLastGeneratedCSR.description: This action returns last generated CSR.
GetLastGeneratedCSR.longDescription: This action returns last generated CSR. The response will contain a signing request that a certificate authority (CA) will sign.

CertificateCollection.description: The link to the certificate collection where the certificate is expected to be installed after the certificate authority (CA) signs the certificate.
CertificateCollection.longDescription: This parameter shall contain a link to a resource collection of type CertificateCollection where the certificate is expected to be installed after the certificate authority (CA) signs the certificate.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

GetLastGeneratedCSRResponse.description: The response body for the GetLastGeneratedCSR action.
GetLastGeneratedCSRResponse.longDescription: This type shall contain the properties found in the response body for the GetLastGeneratedCSR action.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

CSRString.description: The string for the certificate signing request.
CSRString.longDescription: This property shall contain the Privacy Enhanced Mail (PEM)-encoded string, which contains RFC2986-specified structures, of the certificate signing request.  The private key should not be part of the string.

CertificateCollection.description: The link to the certificate collection where the certificate is expected to be installed.
CertificateCollection.longDescription: This property shall contain a link to a resource collection of type CertificateCollection where the certificate is expected to be installed after the certificate authority (CA) has signed the certificate.

title: #DellCertificateService.v1_1_0
